pathAssistantSteps.info:
ADJ: AWAIT:

Adjudication has told you the outcome of their review. Record Adjudication's decision in the key field to the left of this text.

Final step! This loan was either disbursed, canceled, or otherwise lost.


If the opportunity is closed won, please add the Pheonix account number, Pheonix Account Type and Rim/Client No to the Closing Fields section on the Details tab of the Opprtunity.


If the Opportunity is Closed and Lost, please add the Closed Lost Reason to the Closing Fields section on the Details tab of the Opportunity.
Its time to collect all the documents on the Customer's Document Checklist. Please indicate your progress in the key field to the left of this text.

It's time to complete the Customer's Application form.


Step 1 is to complete the Applicant Profile(s). The Applicant Profile is comprised of the (1) Personal Details and (2) Financial Information forms.


﻿Please indicate your progress in the key fields to the left of this text.

Let's continue completing the Customer's Application form. You completed the Applicant Profile(s). Step 2 is to complete the Product(s) Details. Follow these simple steps:


  1. Add each product for this application using the "Add Product" option
  2. Click on the Product Details tab below and complete the relevant product information to compute the calculations.


﻿Please indicate your progress in the key fields to the left of this text.


TIP: If you completed the "Multi-Product" calculator for the Lead, the information will be pre-populated in the Product Details Tab. If you saved different scenarios, be sure to add the scenario the Customer wishes to proceed with, to the Opportunity.
Before starting the loan application, please conduct necessary Credit Bureau and Sanction Screen checks. Please indicate your progress in the key fields to the left of this text.

You have Completed the Application form! Generate the documents for customer review and signature, by clicking the respective buttons, at the end of the Product Details sheet.


﻿Please indicate your progress in the key fields to the left of this text.

Was your Loan Suspended?


﻿Please indicate your progress in the key fields to the left of this text.

Congrats! Your Loan is now in the Processing stage. The customer has a few more documents to sign before we disburse funds.


﻿Please indicate your progress in the key fields to the left of this text.

pathAssistantSteps.info: Do you need an Exception for this Loan? Please fill out the necessary fields, or select No to move on to the next step.

SUBMIT LOAN:

It's time to submit your loan to Adjudication. Follow your JN work instruction to submit the loan via the appropriate system.

TIP: Be sure to complete this step AS SOON AS you have successfully submitted the loan file to Adjudication, for accurate turn time reports.
